vulnerability.name: USN-3990-2
vulnerability.description: USN-3990-1 fixed a vulnerability in urllib3. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that urllib3 incorrectly stripped certain characters from  requests. A remote attacker could use this issue to perform CRLF injection.  (CVE-2019-11236)

statements.status_notes: urllib3 could be used to perform a CRLF injection if it received a specially crafted request. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
